product_des: Please click on the products to view details.
aboutP1: The Italian-Egyptian company for the leading plastic industries at the highest level for manufacturing car battery boxes and covers and motorcycle batteries of all types and models
aboutP2: The idea of ​​establishing the company started in 2016 and started actual work on the ground starting in 2019 after completing all the machines and molds for manufacturing, and during these years we gained the necessary experience that qualifies us to work strongly in the field, where we succeeded within a short period in gaining the confidence of the local market and the Egyptian company dealt With all domestic battery manufacturers without exception
aboutP3: We are also agents of DAKUMAR for the manufacture of injection machines and is considered one of the most important companies in the world
aboutP4: We strive to maintain this reputation by providing the best quality to customers globally, and we aspire to be the first choice when it comes to plastic industries to manufacture car batteries and motorcycle battery covers, and to offer our partners long-term success
whyP1: More than 5 years of experience and more than 10 years of experience and highly qualified staff to provide the highest quality in accordance with international standards with speed and accuracy in implementation
whyP2: We manufacture all plastic components for manufacturing automotive and motorcycle batteries, including the magic eye of batteries of all sizes
whyP3: We work with high quality molds, manufactured by the best international companies for manufacturing plastic injection molds
visionP1: Permanent retention of the highest quality for all customers and importers, in addition to maintaining continuous development accompanying permanent development in the areas of manufacturing
visionP2: Manufacturing car batteries and motorcycle batteries of excellent quality similar to those imported from abroad
visionP3: Making the sufficiency of the local product a substitute for the importer in providing items quickly and in a better quality than foreign currencies on battery factories in the Arab Republic of Egypt
visionP4: Reaching the appropriate level, after which the export process begins for all Arab and foreign countries
